summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that verify the functionality of camera efficiency calculations, simulation models, and result handling for telescope instrumentation. It provides helper utilities to construct mock camera configurations, site and telescope models, and to assess various efficiency components such as reflectivity, NSB rate, and total throughput.
business_intent: Validate and ensure the reliability of the camera efficiency computation and simulation workflow used in astronomical telescope data processing, supporting accurate performance assessment and scientific analysis.
